ComicInfo.Summary:
The passing over rites from queen to queen continue with many initiations in the sweet art of sex, as practiced on the humanoid alien populace of Irth. Lushly painted by the co-author, with Michael Manning, of the Tranceptor series.
*Back Blurb* Siva's adventure continues as she is stolen away to Queen Djalla's tree-top aerie where she is initiated to an ancient and erotic right of passage necessary for her ascension to the throne. Using a sexual catalyst, Djalla guides Siva through a mystical, climactic journey, opening her mind and body to new powers wielded only by the Queens of Irth. In the shadow of the Planet Eater's looming arrival, Siva is under pressure to complete the intense, orgasmic training needed to satiate his sexual appetite!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-14 20:46:16. [Issue ID 239232]
